title: Othasada Rosa Song Lyrics Maruthu
stanzas:
otha sada rosa nenja kizhikkira
patha mada paayaa enna suruttura
otha sada rosa nenja kizhikkira
patha mada paayaa enna suruttura

oyilaathaan udhatta suzhikkira
puyalaattam sozhatti adikkira
pattu veraga irundhen naanum
pasumaiyaaga maara
pacha molagaa   thuvaiyal pola
usuril kaaram yaera

pattu veraga irundhen naanum
pasumaiyaaga maara
pacha molagaa   thuvaiyal pola
usuril kaaram yaera

otha sada rosa nenja kizhikkira
patha mada paayaa enna suruttura

yaeni illama enna nee mela mela yaetha
soraen sellaama nikkiraen
yaendi enna paatha
kevuli satham kood
aenakku kavithaiyaaha kekka
ayira meena onnu kazhuga
alagu pola thookka

unna nenacha nadaiyila udaiyila nodiyila
puthusa maaruraen
konji siricha veluyila theruvila thimirula
karagam aaduraen
otha sada rosa nenja kizhikkira
patha mada paayaa enna suruttura
otha sada rosaa

vaigai aaraga unna
naan kaanjidaama kaapaen
kaalam pooraavum enna
nee kaadhal seiya kaepen
marudhu veeran pola una
naan kadathi poga vaaraen
nethamum naama paesa
nelavu velaiku vanga poren

kannumani un azhugula arivula
thelivula adangi poguraen
chellakili un viliyil veralila
valaivila kezhanga vaeguraen

otha sada rosa nenja kizhikkira
patha mada paayaa enna suruttura
otha sada rosa nenja kizhikkira
patha mada paayaa enna suruttura

oyilaathaan udhatta suzhikkira
puyalaattam sozhatti adikkira
pattu veraga irundhen naanum
pasumaiyaaga maara
pacha molagaa   thuvaiyal pola
usuril kaaram yaera

pattu veraga irundhen naanum
pasumaiyaaga maara
pacha molagaa   thuvaiyal pola
usuril kaaram yaera
